text_block_list.text:
It had only been a few days since I first came to Tracen Academy. 
I was walking through the halls, on my way to the training 
grounds to find an Umamusume to scout, when――
(NYOOM!)
Look oooout!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: A desk's leg flew right past me.
A-Are you okaay.....? Sorry, I'm sorry, so sorrryyyyyy...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Thanks to her warning, I just barely managed to dodge it. 
But, more importantly――
choice_data_list: How'd it even go flying like that...?

text_block_list.text: ――Oh, th-the leg! The desk...! Right, w-w-what, what have I doooone...?!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Wh-whwhwhwhwhwh- what do I do....!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
She stood next to a desk with one of its legs snapped off. 
She looked like she was on the verge of tears, so I let her explain 
things, hoping it might calm her down――

I... I'm clumsy, and dopey... I can't do anything right... 
So I, er, um... Started looking for something helpful I could do...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I noticed Opera O-san's desk was making these clanky sounds... 
I got it in my head that I could maybe fix it without anyone 
noticing, but...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Well, then, um... I used too much strength, and it broke...! 
I got spooked and the leg flew right out of my hand...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: I'm so sorry! Sorry for trying to fix it when I don't know how! Sorry for bothering a trainer who was just passing byyyyyy!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I have to do something before I make trouble for even more 
people. Something, anything... That's it! Maybe glue will get it to 
stick!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: It won't stiiiiiiick!! I-It's all gooey noowwww!!!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Oh, maybe...! 
If I tie it up with a string, surely it'll...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: I can't tie it uuuup!!!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: (SNAP!!)
Hyah!? It broke!? Ah, eh, wh, wh, what do I dooo...!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: <size=34>(I got caught up in supervising her for a while...)</size>

text_block_list.text:
It'd already gotten pretty late. Right as I was about to suggest 
we just talk to school staff to get the desk replaced――
HAAAHHH-HAHAHA!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: I thought I heard a clamorous noise, and what do I find but such tragedie! To think a desk used by one as gorgeous as I would be so lamentably destroyed!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: O-O-O-Opera, Opeope- Opera O-san!? I-I'm sorry, this is because, um, uh, I....
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: EXCELLENT!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: ...Huh?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
My desk laid to the ground, glistening and twinkling, two of its 
legs shattered and splayed... And the moon, bathing it in light!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text:
It's the perfect set for conveying sorrow! 
Look, Doto! Is it not beautiful? My form upon this stage?
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: Y-yes...! You're very beautiful...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Feel free to take pictures! 
You there, prepare for me a wind befitting this moonlit stage!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text:
So, somehow, we ended up doing an impromptu T.M. Opera O 
photo shoot for a while.
Mmmm... The photos turned out quite nicely! Destruction and creation... Hope and despair... And my beautiful self! Bravo!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text:
To think you were hiding such dramatic talent, Doto! 
I'm seeing you in a brand new light!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: Eh, n-no, I'm just... I'm not...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
T.M. Opera O looked her up and down, then nodded with 
satisfaction. Though I couldn't tell if she noticed Meisho Doto 
shrinking back...
――Mm. Just as I thought, my intuition never fails! Let me make you a very special offer!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text:
In my upcoming Opera Show ―― The one they call the 
『Semiannual Race Meet』, you will put on a brand new play with 
me, a story of fierce competition!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text:
...W... What...? 
You, um.... want me to... a- act...?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
To put it simply... The one to play the role of my villain... 
Will be you, Doto!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: WHAAAT?!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
